name: aglio-theme-bluecase
description: Generate Scala case classes from Api-Blueprint specifications

scripts.test_bad: node_modules/.bin/eslint src/*.js && node_modules/.bin/mocha && cd examples/ex1 && sh ./build.sh && sbt test
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/mocha && cd examples/ex1 && sh ./build.sh && sbt test

author: Ed Sweeney
